scripts.prebuild: rm -rf build/* && npx tslint -c tslint.json -p tsconfig.json --fix
scripts.build: tsc && cp package.json build/package.json && cp knexfile.js build/knexfile.js
scripts.package: [ -f ".env" ] && cp .env build && cp -r data build && npm run sed && npm run zip
scripts.dockerize: npm run build && npm run package && npm run zipcurrent && docker build -t storysquad/tricktionary-api .
scripts.develop: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.sed: sed '/^    "prebuild"/d' package.json -- | sed '/^    "build"/d' -- | sed '/^    "prestart"/d' -- | sed '/^    "develop"/d' -- | sed '/^    "sed"/d' -- | sed 's+build/src/index.js+src/index.js+g' > build/package.json
